snippet.title: NBA 2K11 - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
NBA 2K11 is now out everywhere and allows you to play with legends past, present, and future. The game has been met with amazing reviews.

IGN (9.5 out of 10) - "The Best Sports Game of this Generation" 
Sports Illustrated (9.5 out of 10) - "No other sports title nails the realistic look and feel of in-game action quite like NBA 2K11 does here"
G4TV (5 out of 5)- "2K11 is not only the best basketball game I've ever played, it's one of the best sports games I've ever played, and a serious contender for Game of the Year"

Don't miss out, get your copy now! NBA 2K11 is in stores or purchase here:

ESRB Rating: Everyone
